column2: Dredging Spoils have been included as wet waste in order for comparability with the disposal tables
Waste reprocessor data has been removed from the recycling row (sector 37) to avoid double counting in this table. Data in this row include End of Life Vehicles waste.
Fishing waste does not include waste arisings that are non-fish waste from the fishing industry e.g. fishing nets.
